import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ContactPage: React.FC = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', message: '', type: 'general' }); const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); alert('Thank you for your message! We\'ll get back to you soon.'); }; const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
